entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this morning and early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:36 AM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:36 AM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
